Articles.Content:
Hey guys, ever since we were given splashdown effects and simple water, i decided to make a SAS that looked like something that could keep the pod floating upright. In its current state it remains open because we do not have animation ability, hopefully it is of some use to some people, i know i will be using it for my rocket to the Mun.

Description: Before this was invented, pods on splashdown would flood with water and roll upside down, making it difficult to get out of the pod. So they came up with a floatation device to help keep the pod facing upwards so the Kerbalnauts can easily leave the pod.

Feel free to edit the actual texture, i included a blank template with a outline you can put over top cause its terrible...

http://dl.dropbox.com/u/16349584/Floatation%20Device%201.0.zip

This is epic. Have a cookie.

15 SAS Torque is a bonus too. :3

Glad people like it. One little thing i have noticed is they make the pod want to go in nose first instead of having the nose point up. Might make a nosecone re entry shield

In a couple days i will be upload this to the repository, if someone beats me to uploading my file i won\'t freak out.
